<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The valuation assumptions were determined as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;free interest rate:&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company bases the risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;free interest rate on the interest rate payable on U.S. Treasury securities in effect at the time of grant for a period that is commensurate with the assumed expected option term.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Expected term of options:&nbsp;&nbsp;Due to lack of sufficient historical data, the Company estimates the expected life of its stock options granted to employees and members of the board of directors as the arithmetic average of the vesting term and the original contractual term of the option. The Company estimates the expected life of its stock options granted to consultants and nonemployees to be the contractual term of the options.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Expected stock price volatility:&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company estimated the expected volatility based on actual historical volatility of the stock price of other publicly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;traded biotechnology companies engaged in lines of business that are the same or similar to the Company&#x2019;s. The Company calculated the historical volatility of the selected companies by using daily closing prices over a period of the expected term of the associated award. The companies were selected based on their enterprise value, risk profiles, position within the industry, and with historical share price information sufficient to meet the expected term of the associated award. A decrease in the selected volatility would decrease the fair value of the underlying instrument.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Expected annual dividend yield:&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company estimated the expected dividend yield based on consideration of its historical dividend experience and future dividend expectations. The Company has not historically declared or paid dividends to stockholders. Moreover, it does not intend to pay dividends in the future, but instead expects to retain any earnings to invest in the continued growth of the business. Accordingly, the Company assumed and expected dividend yield of 0.0%.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company considered numerous objective and subjective factors in the assessment of fair value of its common stock for grants made prior to the date the Company&#x2019;s common stock began trading separately on the NASDAQ Capital Market, which was November 13, 2015, and includes all grants made to date. The factors considered include the price for the Company&#x2019;s convertible preferred stock that was sold to investors and the rights, preferences and privileges of the convertible preferred stock and common stock, the trading price of the Company&#x2019;s units between the IPO date and November 13, 2015, the Company&#x2019;s financial condition and results of operations during the relevant periods, including the status of the development of the Company&#x2019;s product candidates, and the status of strategic initiatives. These estimates involve a significant level of judgment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, there was approximately $900,890&nbsp;of total unrecognized compensation expense related to unvested options granted under the Plan to be recognized as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11. Income Taxes
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s reserves related to taxes are based on a determination of whether and how much of a tax benefit taken by the Company in its tax filings or positions is more likely than not to be realized. The Company recognized no material adjustment for unrecognized income tax benefits. Through December&nbsp;31, 2015, the Company had no unrecognized tax benefits or related interest and penalties accrued.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	For the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, the Company increased the valuation allowance by $4.8&nbsp;million to fully reserve for the value of deferred tax assets. Due to continued operating losses, there is no indication that it is more likely than not that the Company will be able to utilize its deferred tax assets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 2015 the Company had $51.6 million of Federal and Maryland net operating loss (&#x201C;NOL&#x201D;) carryforwards that will begin to expire in 2031. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015 the Company had $1.4 million and $0.4 million of Maryland and federal research and development credits, respectively, that will begin to expire in 2018. The NOL and research and development credit carryforwards are subject to review and possible adjustment by the Internal Revenue Service and state tax authorities. NOL and tax credit carryforwards may become subject to an annual limitation in the event of certain cumulative changes in the ownership interest of significant shareholders over a three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;year period in excess of 50%, as defined under Sections&nbsp;382 and 383 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, as well as similar state tax provisions. This could limit the amount of NOLs and research and development credits that the Company can utilize annually to offset future taxable income or tax liabilities. The Company has not analyzed the historical or potential impact of its equity financings on beneficial ownership and therefore no determination has been made whether the NOL carryforwards are subject to any Internal Revenue Code Section 382 limitation. To the extent there is a limitation, which could be significant, there would be a reduction in the deferred tax asset with an offsetting reduction in the valuation allowance. Subsequent ownership changes may further affect the limitation in future years. All of the Company&#x2019;s tax years are currently open to examination by each tax jurisdiction in which the Company is subject to taxation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	A reconciliation of income tax expense computed at the statutory federal income tax rate to income taxes as reflected in the financial statements is as follows:
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12. Commitments and Contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Offer Letters
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has entered into offer letters with certain of its executives. The letters provide for, among other items, salary, bonus and severance payments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Resignation of Former Chief Executive Officer
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On December 17, 2015, the Company&#x2019;s President and former Chief Executive Officer (&#x201C;CEO&#x201D;) resigned, which included his resignation as a member of the board of directors of the Company, in each case effective December 31, 2015. The Company entered into a separation agreement pursuant to which the Company agreed to pay the former CEO severance payments in accordance with his existing employment agreement totaling $527,500 and the maintenance of health benefits for a period of up to one year from the separation date. The separation agreement also provided for the modification of existing stock option grants such that all unvested portions of existing stock option grants were immediately vested and all existing stock option grants became exercisable for up to 90 days from the date of separation as in accordance with the terms of the original grants. The former CEO is subject to restrictive covenants, including non-competition and non-solicitation provisions. The severance payments and stock-based compensation related to the modification of existing grants was included as part of general and administrative expenses for the year ended December 31, 2015 in the accompanying statement of operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Office Lease
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In August 2013, the Company entered into a lease for new corporate office space location in Baltimore, Maryland. The lease provides for three months of rent abatement and includes escalating rent payments. Rent expense is recognized on a straight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;line basis over the term of the lease. Rent expense amounted to approximately $190,000 and $192,000 for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively. Pursuant to the terms of such lease, the Company&#x2019;s future lease obligation is as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 80.00%;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:87.60%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.78%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Obligations to Contract Research Organizations and External Service Providers
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has entered into agreements with contract research organizations and other external service providers for services, primarily in connection with the clinical trials and development of the Company&#x2019;s product candidates. The Company was contractually obligated for up to approximately $3.6 million of future services under these agreements as of December 31, 2015. The Company&#x2019;s actual contractual obligations will vary depending upon several factors, including the progress and results of the underlying services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<A NAME="CERC-20151231EX10119DB8B_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.11
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXECUTIVE EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) is entered into effective January 1, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), by and between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Uli Hacksell
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cerecor Inc., a Delaware corporation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company desires to employ the Executive and, in connection therewith, to compensate the Executive for Executive&#x2019;s personal services to the Company; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Executive wishes to be employed by the Company and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provide personal services to the Company in return for certain compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Accordingly, in consideration of the mutual promises and covenants contained herein, the parties agree to the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	1.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Position and Duties.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	pursuant to this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Employment Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall serve as the Chief Executive Officer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. As of the Effective Date, Executive also serves as C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hairman
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company&#x2019;s Board of D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	irectors (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and may continue to do so at the election of the Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	capacity as Chief Executive Officer,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties, authorities and responsibilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	commensurate with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	position
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as the Board shall designate from time to time.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be based in Baltimore, Maryland and shall report to the Board.&nbsp;&nbsp;During the Employment Term,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall devote all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	business time, energy and skill and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	best efforts to the performance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties with the Company;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, that (i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0070C0;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	may be a passive investor or perform non-operational, advisory roles (e.g. advisory boards) provided that such activity does not interfere with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties under this Agreement, and (i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	may engage in limited advisory relationships with companies that are not in competitive markets and civic and not-for-profit activities so long as such activities do not interfere with the performance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties hereunder.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Base Salary.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;Beginning on the Effective Date, the Company agrees to pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a base salary at an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	annual rate of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,000, payable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	subject to standard federal and state payroll withholding requirements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in accordance with the regular payroll practices of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Base Salary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	subject to review and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	adjustment by the Board from time to time.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Annual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Bonus.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During the Employment Term, Executive shall be eligible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a discretionary annual cash bonus of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	45
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	% of Base Salary (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Target Amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;). Any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	bonus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	awarded will be in an amount of up to 45% of Base Salary as determined by the Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	may consist of cash and/or grants of equity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, subject to the results of operations and financial condition of the Company and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	individual performance.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Whether or not Executive earns any bonus will be dependent upon (a) Executive&#x2019;s continuous performance of services to the Company through the date any bonus is paid; and (b) the actual achievement of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	applicable performance targets and goals by Executive (to the extent that goals are established by the Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	after consultation with Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Board will determine in its sole discretion the extent to which Executive and the Company have achieved any performance goals upon which the bonus is based and the amount of the bonus, which could be below the Target Amount (and may be zero).&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Executive&#x2019;s eligibility for a bonus is subject to change in the discretion of the Board
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(or any authorized committee thereof).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0070C0;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The annual period over which performance is measured for purposes of this bonus is January 1 through December 31.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	To the extent the Annual Bonus consists of cash, such amount will be payable subject to standard federal and state payroll withholding requirements on or before March 15 of the year following the year fo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	which it is earned.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Stock Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Subject to approval of the Company&#x2019;s Board, the Company anticipates granting Executive the option to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	360,459
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shares of the Company&#x2019;s common stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, subject to the terms of the Company&#x2019;s 2015 Omnibus Incentive Compensation Plan and standard form of stock option agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;The Option shall be an incentive stock option to the extent permissible under Section 422 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, and will have an exercise price per share
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	equal to the fair market value of a share of common stock of the Company as of the date of grant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	continued employment with the Company,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Executive&#x2019;s right to exercise the Option shall accrue as follows:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	one third of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shares subject to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(33&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3%) shall vest on the first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	anniversary of the Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the remaining 66 2/3% of the shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	subject to the Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will then vest in equal monthly installments on each monthly anniversary date of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	first vesting date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	over the following 24 months
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">

	&nbsp; &nbsp;

	Executive

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	reasonable business expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For the avoidance of doubt, to the extent that any reimbursements payable to Executive&nbsp;&nbsp;are subject to the provisions of Section 409A of the Code:&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) any such reimbursements will be paid no later than December 31 of the year following the year in which the expense was incurred, (b) the amount of expenses reimbursed in one year will not affect the amount eligible for reimbursement in any subsequent year, and (c) the right to reimbursement under this Agreement will not be subject to liquidation or exchange for another benefit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

	his home in

	and Lodging

	and Lodging

	Expenses are incurred.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, to the extent that any reimbursements payable to Executive&nbsp;&nbsp;pursuant to this Section

	5(

	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the Code:&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) any such reimbursements will be paid no later than December 31 of the year following the year in which the expense was incurred, (b)&nbsp;the amount of expenses reimbursed in one year will not affect the amount eligible for reimbursement in any subsequent year, and (c) the right to reimbursement under this Agreement will not be subject to liquidation or exchange for another benefit.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	6.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Termination of Employment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The parties acknowledge that Executive&#x2019;s employment relationship with the Company is at-will.&nbsp;&nbsp;Either Executive or the Company may terminate the employment relationship at any time, with or without Cause.&nbsp;&nbsp;The provisions in this Section govern the amount of compensation, if any, to be provided to Executive upon termination of employment and do not alter this at-will status.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Death or Disability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment shall immediately terminate on the date of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	death or upon ten (10) days&#x2019; prior written notice by the Company for Disability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Termination of Executive&#x2019;s employment based on &#x201C;Disability&#x201D; shall mean termination because Executive is unable due to a physical or mental condition to perform the essential functions of his position with or without reasonable accommodation for 180 days in the aggregate during any twelve (12) month period or based on the written certification by two licensed physicians of the likely continuation of such condition for such period.&nbsp;&nbsp;This definition shall be interpreted and applied consistent with the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Family and Medical Leave Act, and other applicable law.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	termination due to death or Disability,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	estate or legal representative, if applicable) shall be entitled to the following payments and benefits: (i) any unpaid Base Salary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	through the date of termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any accrued but unused vacation time paid on the Company&#x2019;s next regular payroll date, or earlier if required by law; (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	reimbursement for any unreimbursed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	reasonable, documented
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	business expenses incurred through the date of termination and in accordance with Company policy, payable within thirty (30) days following such termination of employment, (ii
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) all other vested payments, benefits or fringe benefits to which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	entitled under the terms of any applicable compensation arrangement or benefit, equity or fringe benefit plan or program or grant (collectively,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Sections&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, 6(a)(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)(i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be hereafter referred to as the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Accrued Benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and (iii) subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, or, in the event of death, Executive&#x2019;s person
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	al
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	representative&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	compliance with the obligations in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Sections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	7,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hereof, an amount equal to the average of the annual full-year cash bonuses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	received from the Company for the three (3) completed calendar years prior to termination (or fewer full year periods if the employment term is less than three (3) years, pro rated for the portion of the year in which such termination occurred (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Pro Rata Average Bonus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	subject to standard payroll deductions and withholdings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, payable in twelve (12) equal monthly installments following such termination;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, that the first payment shall be made on the first payroll period after the sixtieth (60
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:6PT;TOP:-4.8PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) day following such termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and shall include payment of any amounts that would otherwise be due prior thereto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company shall terminate immediately upon written notice by the Company for Cause.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D; shall mean: (i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	willful misconduct or gross negligence in the performance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties to the Company that, if capable of cure, is not cured within thirty (30) days of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	receipt of written notice from the Company; (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	failure to perform
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties to the Company or to follow the lawful directives of the Board (other than as a result of death or a physical or mental incapacity) that, if capable of cure, is not cured within thirty (30) days of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	receipt of written notice from
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">

<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage136"></A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company; (iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any conduct which constitutes a felony under applicable law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	; (iv) any act of theft, fraud, malfeasance or dishonesty in connection with the performance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties to the Company; or; (v) a material breach of this Agreement or any other agreement with the Company, or a material violation of the Company&#x2019;s code of conduct or other written policy that, if capable of cure, is not cured within thirty (30) days of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	receipt of written notice from the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon a termination for Cause,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive will not receive severance payments, or any other severance compensation or benefit, except that, consistent with the Company&#x2019;s standard payroll policies, the Company shall provide to Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Accrued Benefits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Without Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment may be terminated by the Company without Cause (other than for death or Disability) immediately upon written notice by the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon a termination without Cause, the Company shall pay to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Accrued Benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, paid according to the Company&#x2019;s standard payroll policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ubject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	compliance w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ith the obligations in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Sections&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	7,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and 9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hereof,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive will be eligible for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the following severance benefits:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	continued payment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Base Salary as in effect immediately prior to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	termination for twelve (12) months following such termination and (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Pro Rata
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Average
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Bonus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	such payments pursuant to clauses (1) and (2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will be subject to standard payroll deductions and withholdings, will be paid in twelve (12) equal monthly installments following the termination date, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the first payment pursuant to these clauses (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) and (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) shall be made
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	on the Company&#x2019;s first ordinary payroll date that occurs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at least
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	sixty (60) days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	following the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	termination d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and shall include payment of any amounts that would otherwise be due prior thereto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	f Executive timely elects continued coverage under COBRA for himself and his covered dependents under the Company&#x2019;s group health plans following such termination, then the Company shall pay the COBRA premiums necessary to continue Executive&#x2019;s and his covered dependents&#x2019; health insurance coverage in effect for himself (and his covered dependents) on the termination date until the earliest of: (x) the first anniversary of Executive&#x2019;s termination; (y) the date when Executive becomes eligible for substantially equivalent health insurance coverage in connection with new employment or self-employment; or (z) the date Executive ceases to be eligible for COBRA continuation coverage for any reason, including plan termination (such period from the termination date through the earlier of (x)-(z), (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	COBRA Payment Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, if at any time the Company determines that its payment of COBRA premiums on Executive&#x2019;s behalf would result in a violation of applicable law (including, but not limited to, the 2010 Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, as amended by the 2010 Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act), then in lieu of paying COBRA premiums pursuant to this Section, the Company shall pay Executive on the last day of each remaining month of the COBRA Payment Period, a fully taxable cash payment equal to the COBRA premium for such month, subject to applicable tax withholding, for the remainder of the COBRA Payment Period.&nbsp;&nbsp;Nothing in this Agreement shall deprive Executive of his rights under COBRA or ERISA for benefits under plans and policies arising under his employment by the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Restricted Stock Award and any stock option or stock award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	granted during the Employment Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall vest in full
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
