<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage137"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For Good Reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment shall terminate upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	written notice to the Company of a termination for Good Reason.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Good Reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D; for resignation shall mean the occurrence of any of the following without the Executive&#x2019;s prior written consent:&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) a reduction in Executive&#x2019;s title, reporting relationship or the assignment to Executive of any duties or responsibilities which result in the material diminution of Executive&#x2019;s then current position; provided, however, that the acquisition of the Company and subsequent conversion of the Company to a division or unit of the acquiring company will not by itself result in a diminution of Executive&#x2019;s position; (ii) a material reduction in Executive&#x2019;s base salary, which the parties agree is a reduction of at least 10% of Executive&#x2019;s base salary (unless pursuant to a salary reduction program applicable generally to the Company&#x2019;s similarly situated employees); (iii) relocation of Executive&#x2019;s primary office to a location that increases Executive&#x2019;s commute by more than thirty-five (35) miles from the location at which Executive worked immediately prior to such change; or (iv) a material breach by the Company of the terms of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, any actions taken by the Company to accommodate a disability of the Executive or pursuant to the Family and Medical Leave Act shall not constitute Good Reason for purposes of this Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;Upon a termination for Good Reason,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eligible for the severance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	benefits described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	subject to compliance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 7, 8 and 9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Other Obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon any termination of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall promptly resign from the Board and any other position as an officer, director or fiduciary of any Company-related entity.&nbsp;&nbsp;Payments and be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nefits provided in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be in lieu of any termination or severance payments or benefits for which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	may be eligible under any of the plans, policies or programs of the Company or under the Worker Adjustment Retraining Notification Act of 1988 or any similar state statute or regulation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The damages caused by the termination of Executive's employment without Cause or for Good Reason would be difficult to ascertain; therefore, the severance for which Executive is eligible pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is agreed to by the parties as liquidated damages, to serve as full compensation, and not a penalty.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	7.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Release.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;Any payments and benefits provided under this Agreement, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	accelerated vesting of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Restricted Stock Award, beyond the Accrued Benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall only be payable if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	execute
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and deliver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to the Company and do
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	es
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	not revoke a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	separation agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in a form reasonably satisfactory to the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	containing a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	full,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	general release of claims in favor of the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such release
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	must
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	be executed and delivered (and no longer subject to revocation, if applicable) within sixty (60) days following termination.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company shall deliver to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	such release within seven (7) days after termination.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	8.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Restrictive Covenants.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Confidentiality
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall not, directly or indirectly, use, make available, sell, disclose or otherwise communicate to any person, either during
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment or at any time thereafter, any business and technical information or trade secrets, nonpublic, proprietary or confidential information, knowledge or data relating to the Company, any of its subsidiaries, affiliated companies or businesses, which shall have been obtained by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	during his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment by the Company (or any predecessor).&nbsp;&nbsp;The foregoing shall not apply to information that (A) was known to the public prior to its disclosure to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or (B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	required to disclose by applicable law, regulation or legal process
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage138"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(provided that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company with prior notice of the contemplated disclosure and cooperate with the Company at its expense in seeking a protective order or other appropriate protection of such information).&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The terms and conditions of this Agreement shall remain strictly confidential, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hereby agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	not to disclose the terms and conditions hereof to any person or entity, other than immediate family members, legal advisors or personal tax or financial advisors, or prospective future employers solely for the purpose of disclosing the limitations on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	conduct imposed by the provisions of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Non-Competition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	acknowledge
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	perform
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	services of a unique nature for the Company that are irreplaceable, and that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	performance of such services to a competing business will result in irreparable harm to the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Accordingly, during the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment hereunder and for a period of one (1) year thereafter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will not, directly or indirectly,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	solicit, perform, or provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Conflicting Services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(whether as an employee, consultant, independent contractor or otherwise, and whether or not for compensation) in any locale of any country in which the Company conducts business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(in the case of the one (1) year period following termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in any locale of a country in which the Company was conducting business in the one (1) year period prior to the termination date)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For purposes of this Agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Conflicting Services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means any product, service, or process or the research and development thereof, of any person or organization other than the Company that directly competes with a product, service, or process, including the research and development thereof, of the Company with which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	worked directly or indirectly during
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment by the Company or about which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	acquired
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	roprietary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nformation during
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment by the Company.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing herein shall prohibit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from being a passive owner of not more than two percent (2%) of the equity securities of a publicly traded corporation engaged in a business that is in competition with the Company or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Non-Solicitation; Non-Interference
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company and for a period of one (1) year thereafter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall not, directly or indirectly, individually or on behalf of any other person, firm, corporation or other entity, solicit, aid or induce any customer of the Company or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates to purchase goods or services then sold by the Company or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates from another person, firm, corporation or other entity or assist or aid any other persons or entity in identifying or soliciting any such customer.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company and for a period of one (1) year thereafter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall not, directly or indirectly, individually or on behalf of any other person, firm, corporation or other entity, (A) solicit, aid or induce any employee, representative or agent of the Company or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates to leave such employment or retention or to accept employment with or render services to or with any other person, firm, corporation or other entity unaffiliated with the Company or directly hire or retain any such employee, representative or agent, or take any action to materially assist or aid any other person, firm, corporation or other entity in identifying, hiring or soliciting any such employee, representative or agent, or (B) interfere, or aid or induce any other person or entity in interfering, with the relationship between the Company or any of its subsidiaries or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	affiliates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of their
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	respective vendors, joint venturers or licensors.&nbsp;&nbsp;An employee, representative or agent shall be
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage139"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	deemed covered by this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	if such person was employed or retained during anytime within six (6) months prior to, or after,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	termination of employment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Non-Disparagement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	not to make negative comments or otherwise disparage the Company or its officers, directors, employees, shareholders, agents or products, in any manner likely to be harmful to them or their business, business reputation or personal reputation.&nbsp;&nbsp;The foregoing shall not be violated by truthful statements in response to legal process, required governmental testimony or filings, or administrative or arbitral proceedings (including, without limitation, depositions in connection with such proceedings).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing in this Agreement shall limit Executive&#x2019;s right to discuss his employment with the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, United States Department of Labor, the National Labor Relations Board, other federal government agency or similar state or local agency or to discuss the terms and conditions of his employment with others to the extent expressly permitted by Section 7 of the National Labor Relations Act.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inventions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	acknowledge
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that all ideas, methods, inventions, discoveries, improvements, work products or developments (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inventions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;), whether patentable or unpatentable, (A) that relate to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	work with the Company, made or conceived by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, solely or jointly with others, during the Employment Term, or (B) suggested by any work that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	perform
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in connection with the Company, either while performing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties with the Company or on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	own time, but only insofar as the Inventions are related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	work as an employee or other service provider to the Company, shall belong exclusively to the Company (or its designee), whether o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	r not patent applications are f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	l
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ed thereon.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will keep full and complete written records (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Records
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;), in the manner prescribed by the Company, of all Inventions, and will promptly disclose all Inventions completely and in writing to the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Records shall be the sole and exclusive property of the Company, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will surrender them upon the termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Employment Term, or upon the Company&#x2019;s request.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will assign to the Company the Inventions and all patents that may issue thereon in any and all countries, whether during or subsequent to the Employment Term, together with the right to file, in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	name or in the name of the Company (or its designee), applications for patents and equivalent rights (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Applications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will, at any time during and subsequent to the Employment Term, make such applications, sign such papers, take all rightful oaths, and perform all acts as may be requested from time to time by the Company with respect to the Inventions.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will also execute assignments to the Company (or its designee) of the Applications, and give the Company and its attorneys all reasonable assistance (including the giving of testimony) to obtain the Inventions for its benefit, all without additional compensation to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from the Company, but entirely at the Company&#x2019;s expense.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement will not be deemed to require assignment of any Invention that Executive develops entirely on his own time without using the Company&#x2019;s equipment, supplies,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	facilities, trade secrets, or proprietary i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nformation, except for those Inventions that either (i) relate to the Company&#x2019;s actual or anticipated business, research or development, or (ii) result from or are connected with work performed by Executive for the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, this Agreement does not apply to any Invention which qualifies fully for protection from assignment to the Company under any specifically applicable state law, regulation, rule, or public policy or
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	which otherwise qualifies as a nonassignable Invention under Del. Code Ann., Title 19, &#xA7; 805.&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In addition, the Inventions will be deemed Work for Hire, as such term is defined under the copyright laws of the United States, on behalf of the Company and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that the Company will be the sole owner of the Inventions, and all underlying rights therein, in all media now known or hereinafter devised, throughout the universe and in perpetuity without any further obligations to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Inventions, or any portion thereof, are deemed not to be Work for Hire,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hereby irrevocably convey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>

	, transfer

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s

	to the Company, all rights, in all media now known or hereinafter devised, throughout the universe and in perpetuity, in and to the Inventions, including, without limitation, all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	right, title and interest in the copyrights (and all renewals, revivals and extensions thereof) to the Inventions, including, without limitation, all rights of any kind or any nature now or hereafter recognized, including without limitation, the unrestricted right to make modifications, adaptations and revisions to the Inventions, to exploit and allow others to exploit the Inventions and all rights to sue at law or in equity for any infringement, or other unauthorized use or conduct in derogation of the Inventions, known or unknown, prior to the date hereof, including, without limitation, the right to receive all proceeds and damages therefrom.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition,
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	being an employee of or other service provider to the Company.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">

</FONT>

	Reasonableness of Restrictions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive agrees that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ha
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	read

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and understand
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	it.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that this
</FONT>

	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	does not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	prevent him
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from earning a living or pursuing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	career.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that the restrictions contained in this Agreement are reasonable, proper, and necessitated by the Company&#x2019;s legitimate business interests.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	represent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	entering into this Agreement freely and with knowledge of its contents with the intent to be bound by the Agreement and the restrictions contained in it.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the event that a court finds this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, or any of its restrictions, to be ambiguo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	us, unenforceable, or invalid, Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the Company agree that the court will read the Agreement as a whole and interpret the restriction(s) at issue to be enforceable and valid to the maximum extent allowed by law.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the court declines to enforce this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in the manner provided in subsection

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 8(g)(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the Company agree that this Agreement will be
</FONT>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

	automatically modified to provide the Company with the maximum protection of its business interests allowed by law and

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(iv)

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If after applying the provisions of subsections

	Section 8(g)(ii)-(iii)

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or any of its restrictions is unenforceable for lack of reasonable geographic limitation and the restriction(s) cannot otherwise be enforced, the parties hereby agree that the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	fifty (50)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;mile rad
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ius from any location at which Executive

	worked for the Company on either a regular or occasional basis during the one (1) year immediately preceding termination of

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company shall be the geographic limitation relevant to the contested restriction.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(h)

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tolling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of any violation of the provisions of this

	shall be extended by a period of time equal to the period of such violation, it being the intention of the parties hereto that the running of the applicable post-termination restriction period shall be tolled during any period of such violation.

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i)

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Survival of Provisions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The obligations contained in
</FONT>

	8 and 9

	hereof shall survive the termination or expiration of the Employment Term and
</FONT>

	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company and shall be fully enforceable thereafter.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	9.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Cooperation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;Upon the receipt of reasonable notice from the Company (including outside counsel),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that while employed by the Company and thereafter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will respond and provide information with regard to matters in which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ha
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	knowledge as a result of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company, and will provide reasonable assistance to the Company, its affiliates and their respective representatives in defense of any claims that may be made against the Company or its affiliates, and will assist the Company and its affiliates in the prosecution of any claims that may be made by the Company or its affiliates, to the extent that such claims may relate to the period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to promptly inform the Company if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	become
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	aware of any lawsuits involving such claims that may be filed or threatened against the Company or its affiliates.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	also agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to promptly inform the Company (to the extent that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	legally permitted to do so) if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	asked to assist in any investigation of the Company or its affiliates (or their actions), regardless of whether a lawsuit or other proceeding has then been filed against the Company or its affiliates with respect to such investigation, and shall not do so unless legally required.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon presentation of appropriate documentation, the Company shall pay or reimburse
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for all reasonable out-of-pocket travel, duplicating or telephonic expenses incurred by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in complying with this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and agree

	s

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that the Company&#x2019;s remedies at law for a breach or threatened breach of a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ny of the provisions of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

	8

	9

	hereof would be inadequate and, in recognition of this fact,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive

	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that, in the event of such a breach or threatened breach, in addition to any remedies at law, the Company, without posting any bond, shall be entitled to equitable relief in the form of specific performance, a temporary restraining order, a temporary or permanent injunction or any other equitable remedy which may then be available.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of a violation by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of
</FONT>

	Section

	8

	or Section

	9

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hereof, any severance being paid to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	pursuant to this Agreement or otherwise shall

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	immediately cease, and any severance previously paid to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(other than $1,000) shall be immediately repaid to the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Assignments.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;This Agreement is personal to each of the parties hereto.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as provided in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, no party may assign or delegate any rights or obligations hereunder without first obtaining the written co
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nsent of the other party hereto except that t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he Company may assign this Agreement to any successor to all or substantially all of the business and/or assets of the Company.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	12.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notice.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any notices required hereunder to be in writing shall be deemed effectively given: (a) upon personal delivery to the party to be notified, (b) when sent by electronic mail, telex or confirmed facsimile if sent during normal business hours of the recipient, and if not, then on the next business day, (c) five (5) days after having been sent by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, or (d) one (1) day after deposit with a nationally recognized overnight courier, specifying next day delivery, with written verification of receipt.&nbsp;&nbsp;All communications shall be sent to the Company at its primary office location and to Employee at Employee's address as listed on the Company payroll or to the Employee's Company-issued email address, or at such other address as the Company or the Employee may designate by ten (10) days advance written notice to the other.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	13.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severability.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;The provisions of this Agreement shall be deemed severable and the invalidity or unenforceability of any provision shall not affect the validity or enforceability of the other provisions hereof.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	14.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Counterparts.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;This Agreement may be executed in several counterparts, each of which shall be deemed to be an original but all of which together will constitute one and the same instrument.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	15.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Governing Law; Disputes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;The validity, interpretation, construction and performance of this Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Delaware without regard to the choice of law principles thereof that would result in the application of the laws of any other jurisdiction.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the Company agree that any action or proceeding to enforce or arising out of this Agreement may be commenced in the state appellate courts of New Castle County, Wilmington, Delaware or the United States District Court for the District of Delaware in Wilmington, Delaware.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the Company consent to such jurisdiction, agree that venue will be proper in such courts and waive any objections upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	forum non conveniens
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	16.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Miscellaneous.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;No provision of this Agreement may be modified, waived or discharged unless such waiver, modification or discharge is agreed to in writing and signed by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and such officer or director as may be designated by the Board.&nbsp;&nbsp;No waiver by either party hereto at any time of any breach by the other party hereto of, or compliance with, any condition or provision of this Agreement to be performed by such other party shall be deemed a waiver of similar or dissimilar provisions or conditions at the same or at any prior or subsequent time.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement together with all exhibits hereto sets forth the entire agreement of the parties hereto in respect of the subject matter contained herein and supersedes any and all prior agreements or understandings between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the Company with respect to the subject matter hereof.&nbsp;&nbsp;No agreements or
</FONT>
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	representations, oral or otherwise, express or implied, with respect to the subject matter hereof have been made by either party which are not expressly set forth in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	17.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Representations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	represent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and warrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to the Company that (a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ha
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the legal right to enter into this Agreement and to perform all of the obligations on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	part to be performed hereunder in accordance with its terms, and (b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	not a party to any agreement or understanding, written or oral, and is not subject to any restriction, which, in either case, could prevent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from entering into this Agreement or performing all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	duties and obligations hereunder.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	18.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tax Withholding.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;The Company may withhold from any and all amounts payable under this Agreement such federal, state and local taxes as may be required to be withheld pursuant to any applicable law or regulation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:20PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	19.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Code Section 409A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The intent of the parties is that payments and benefits under this Agreement comply with, or be exempt from, Internal Revenue Code Section 409A and the regulations and guidance promulgated thereunder (collectively &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Code Section 409A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) and, accordingly, to the maximum extent permitted, this Agreement shall be interpreted to be in compliance therewith.&nbsp;&nbsp;In no event whatsoever shall the Company be liable for any additional tax, interest or penalty that may be imposed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	by Code Section 409A or any damages for failing to comply with Code Section 409A.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A termination of employment shall not be deemed to have occurred for purposes of any provision of this Agreement providing for the payment of any amounts or benefits upon or following a termination of employment that are considered &#x201C;non-qualified deferred compensation&#x201D; under Code Section 409A unless such termination is also a &#x201C;separation from service&#x201D; within the meaning of Code Section 409A and, for purposes of any such provision of this Agreement, references to a &#x201C;termination,&#x201D; &#x201C;termination of employment&#x201D; or like terms shall mean &#x201C;separation from service.&#x201D;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	deemed on the date of termination to be a &#x201C;specified employee&#x201D; within the meaning of that term under Code Section 409A(a)(2)(B), then with regard to any payment that is considered non-qualified deferred compensation under Code Section 409A payable on account of a &#x201C;separation from service,&#x201D; such payment or benefit shall be made or provided at the date which is the earlier of (A) the expiration of the six (6)-month period measured from the date of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;separation from service&#x201D;, and (B) the date of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	death (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Delay Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the expiration of the Delay Period, all payments and benefits delayed pursuant to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(whether they would have otherwise been payable in a single sum or in installments in the absence of such delay) shall be paid or reimbursed to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in a lump sum and any remaining payments and benefits due under this Agreement shall be paid or provided in accordance with the normal payment dates specified for them herein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	With regard to any provision herein that provides for reimbursement of costs and expenses or in-kind benefits, except as permitted by Code Section 409A, (i) the right to reimbursement or in-kind benefits shall not be subject to liquidation or exchange for another benefit, (ii) the amount of expenses eligible for reimbursement, or in-kind benefits, provided during any taxable year shall not affect the expenses eligible for reimbursement, or in-kind benefits
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

	&nbsp;

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to be provided, in any other taxable year, provided that the foregoing clause (ii) shall not be violated with regard to expenses reimbursed under any arrangement covered by Internal Revenue Code Section 105(b) solely because such expenses are subject to a limit related to the period the arrangement is in effect and (iii) such payments shall be made on or before the last day of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	taxable year following the taxable year in which the expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	was in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	curred.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For purposes of Code Section 409A,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	right to receive any installment payments pursuant to this Agreement shall be treated as a right to receive a series of separate and distinct payments.&nbsp;&nbsp;In no event may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, directly or indirectly, designate the calendar year of any payment to be made under this Agreement that is considered non-qualified deferred compensation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
