<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 24PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT A
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 24PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LIMITED EXCLUSION NOTIFICATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	THIS IS TO NOTIFY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	you in accordance with Del. Code Ann., Title 19, &#xA7; 805
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that the Agreement between you and Company does not require you to assign or offer to assign to Company any Invention that you develop entirely on your own time without using Company&#x2019;s equipment, supplies, facilities or trade secret information, except for those Inventions that either:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Relate to Company&#x2019;s business, or actual or demonstrably anticipated research or development; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Result from any work performed by you for Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	To the extent a provision in the foregoing Agreement purports to require you to assign an Invention otherwise excluded from the preceding paragraph, the provision is against the public policy of this state and is unenforceable.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<A NAME="CERC-20151231EX10126BF65_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 10.12
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	23

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Blake M. Paterson
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Re:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Separation Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Dear
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Blake
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This letter sets forth the substance of the separation agreement (the &#x201C;Agreement&#x201D;) which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Cerecor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Inc.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) is offering to you to aid in your employment transition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Separation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company has accepted your resignation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	employment with the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;Separation Date&#x201D;).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The letter agreement between you and the Company dated April 28, 2011
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;Employment Agreement&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, requires you to resign
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from the Company&#x2019;s Board of Directors and as an officer of the Company when your employment terminates for any reason.&nbsp;&nbsp;Therefor you agree to execute
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and deliver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to Uli Hacksell
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the resignation letter attached
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A (the &#x201C;Resignation Letter&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Accrued Salary and Vacation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;On the next regular payroll date following the Separation Date, the Company will pay you all accrued salary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	all accrued and unused vacation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	earned through the Separation Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	an annual bonus for the year ending on December 31, 2015, in the amount of $207,500.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	subject to standard payroll deductions and withholdings.&nbsp;&nbsp;You will receive these payments regardless of whether or not you sign this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Severance Benefits.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	f you execute
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	this Agreement on or after December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and do not revoke
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	it
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and execute and deliver the Resignation Letter attached as Exhibit A,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	provide you with the following &#x201C;Severance Benefits&#x201D;:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	make severance payments to you in the form of continuation of your base salary in effect on the Separation Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(which the parties agree is currently $415,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	on an annualized basis)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	12)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	months following the Separation Date.&nbsp;&nbsp;These payments will be subject to standard payroll deductions and with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	holdings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and will be made on the Company&#x2019;s ordinary payroll dates, beginning with the first such date which occurs at least
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	sixty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	60
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) days following the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Separation Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(&#x201C;Initial Severance Payment Date&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, provided the Company has received the executed Agreement from you on or before that date.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The first payment under this clause shall be equal to the aggregate amount of payments that the Company would have paid through the Initial Severance Payment Date had such payments commenced on the Separation Date, with the balance of the payments paid thereafter on the schedule described above.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company will pay you
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	112,500
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is additional payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will be subject to standard payroll deductions and withholdings and will be paid in twelve (12) equal
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage147"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:4.41176470588235%;MARGIN-RIGHT:4.41176470588235%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	monthly installments following the Separation Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	with the first payment on the Company&#x2019;s first ordinary payroll date that occurs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at least six (6) months following the Separation Date (the &#x201C;Six Month Payment Date&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, provided the Company has received the executed Agreement from you
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in accordance with the terms of this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The first payment under this clause shall be equal to the aggregate amount of payments that the Company would have paid through the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Six Month Payment Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	had such payments commenced on the Separation Date, with the balance of the payments paid thereafter on the schedule described above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	f you timely elect continued coverage under COBRA for yourself
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and your covered dependents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	under the Company&#x2019;s group health plans following the Separation Date, then the Company will pay the COBRA premiums necessary to continue your health insurance coverage in effect for yourself
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and your covered dependents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Separation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ate until the earliest of (A) the first anniversary of the Separation Date,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	B) the expiration of your eligibility for the continuation coverage under COBRA, or (C) the date when you become eligible for substantially equivalent health insurance coverage (such period from the Separation Date through the earliest of (A) through (C), the &#x201C;COBRA Payment Period.&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, if at any time the Company determines that its payment of COBRA premiums on your behalf would result in a violation of applicable law (including, but not limited to, the 2010 Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, as amended by the 2010 Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act), then in lieu of paying COBRA premiums pursuant to this Section, the Company will pay you on the last day of each remaining month of the COBRA Payment Period, a fully taxable cash payment equal to the COBRA premium for such month, subject to applicable tax withholding (such amount, the &#x201C;Special Severance Payment&#x201D;), for the remainder of the COBRA Payment Period.&nbsp;&nbsp;Nothing in this Agreement shall deprive you of your rights under COBRA or ERISA for benefits under plans and policies arising under your employment by the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If you become eligible for coverage under another employer's group health plan or otherwise cease to be eligible for COBRA during the COBRA Payment Period, you must immediately notify the Company of such event, and all payments and obligations under this clause will cease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Benefit Plans.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	If you are currently participating in the Company&#x2019;s group health insurance plans, your participation as an employee will end on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Thereafter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to the extent provided by the federal COBRA law or, if applicable, state insurance laws, and by the Company&#x2019;s current group health insurance policies, you will be eligible to continue your group health insurance benefits at your own expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, with the option for certain COBRA payments to be made by the Company as described in Section 3 above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Later, you may be able to convert to an individual policy through the provider of the Company&#x2019;s health insurance, if you wish.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Your participation in Employer-Sponsored Group Life Insurance and Short and Long Term Disability Insurance will cease as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Deductions for the 401(k) Plan will end with your last regular paycheck.&nbsp;&nbsp;You will receive information by mail concerning 401(k) plan rollover procedures should you be a participant in this program.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

	You have the right to continue your current Health Care Spending Account if you are participating in this program.&nbsp;&nbsp;Enclosed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as Exhibit B

	is the information concerning how to continue this benefit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Dependent Care Spending Accounts can not be continued.&nbsp;&nbsp;You

	r

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pay period.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless you elect to continue your Health Care Spending Account, you will only be eligible to claim expense

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s

	that you incurred prior to

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Stock Options.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	On a post-split basis, you were granted three separate options to purchase shares of the Company&#x2019;s common stock (each, an &#x201C;Option&#x201D;) in the share amounts of 107,142 shares (granted May 8, 2012, pursuant to the Company&#x2019;s 2011 Stock Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;2011 Plan&#x201D;)), 54,353 shares (granted July 10, 2014, pursuant to the 2011 Plan), and 160,000 shares (granted on or about October 20, 2015 through Board action taken on September 2, 2015, pursuant to the 2015 Omnibus Incentive Compensation Plan (the &#x201C;2015 Plan&#x201D;)).&nbsp; For the grants made on May 8, 2012 and July 10, 2014, all shares subject to such Options are fully vested as of the Separation Date in accordance with the terms of the stock option agreements governing such grants.&nbsp; If you timely return and do not revoke this fully signed Agreement to the Company, then (i) the vesting of the Option granted to you on or about October 20, 2015 will be fully accelerated such that 100% of the shares subject to such Option shall be exercisable by you effective as of the Separation Date and (ii) notwithstanding anything to the contrary in the 2011 Plan, the 2015 Plan, the option grant notices, and the stock option agreements entered into by you and the Company and any other documents between you and the Company setting forth the terms of your Options (the &#x201C;Option Documents&#x201D;), your Options will be amended such that you may exercise any vested Options on or before the expiration of the applicable term set forth in the Option Documents governing the applicable Option.&nbsp; You and the Company hereby consent to the modification and amendment of the terms governing your Options and the Option Documents to conform to the provisions of this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, with such modification to occur within thirty (30) days of your execution of the Agreement, provided that you have not revoked your acceptance of the Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp; Except as modified by this Agreement, all terms, conditions and limitations applicable to the Options will remain in full force and effect pursuant to the applicable Option Documents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;The parties agree that Section 9(b) of the Employment Agreement will be modified as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Non-Competition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Executive acknowledges that he performs services of a unique nature for the Company that are irreplaceable, and that his performance of such services to a competing business will result in irreparable harm to the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Accordingly, during the Executive&#x2019;s employment hereunder and for a period of one (1) year thereafter, Executive agrees that he will not, directly or indirectly, solicit, perform, or provide Conflicting Services (whether as an employee, consultant, independent contractor or otherwise, and whether or not for compensation) in any locale of any country in which the Company conducts business (in the case of the one (1) year period following termination, in any locale of a country in which the Company was conducting business in the one (1) year period prior to the termination date).&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this Agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;Conflicting Services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means any product, service, or process or the research and development thereof, of any person or organization other than the Company that directly competes with a product, service, or process, including the research and development thereof, of the Company with which Executive worked directly or indirectly during his employment by the Company or about which he acquired proprietary information during his employment by the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing herein shall prohibit Executive from being a passive owner of not more than two percent (2%) of the equity securities of a publicly traded corporation engaged in a business that is in competition with the Company or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Confidentiality.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;The provisions of this Agreement will be held in strictest confidence by you and will not be publicized or disclosed in any manner whatsoever;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	provided, however,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that:&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) you may disclose this Agreement to your immediate family; (b) you may disclose this Agreement in confidence to your attorney, accountant, auditor, tax preparer, and financial advisor; and (c) you may disclose this Agreement insofar as such disclosure may be
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Cooperation a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	fter Termination.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During the time that you are receiving payments under this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	yo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	u agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at you
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will respond
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to reasonable requests, at reasonable times and places,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and provide information with regard to matters in which you have knowledge as a result of your employment with the Company, and will provide reasonable assistance to the Company, its affiliates and their respective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	representatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in defense of any claims that may be made against the Company or its affiliates, and will assist the Company and its affiliates in the prosecution of any claims that may be made by the Company or its affiliates, to the extent that such claims may relate to the period of your employment with the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;You agree to promptly inform the Company if you become aware of any lawsuits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	involving
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	such claims that may be filed or threatened against the Company or its affiliates.&nbsp;&nbsp;You also agree to promptly inform the Company (to the extent that you are legally permitted to do so) if you are asked to assist in any investigation of the Company or its affiliates (or their actions), regardless of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	whether
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a lawsuit or other proceeding has then been filed against the Company or its affiliates with respect to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	investigation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, and shall not do so unless legally required.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon presentation of appropriate documentation, the Company shall pay or reimburse you for all reasonable out-of-pocket travel, duplicating or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	telephonic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	expenses incurred by you in complying
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	this Section.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Release.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In exchange for the payments and other consideration under this Agreement, to which you would not otherwise be entitled, and except as otherwise set forth in this Agreement, you
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	on behalf of yourself and, to the extent permitted by law, on behalf of your spouse, heirs, executors, administrators, assigns, insurers, attorneys and other persons or entities, acting or purporting to act on your behalf (collectively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Employee Parties&#x201D;)

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	representatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, employees, attorneys, shareholders,
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, insurers

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and affiliates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company P
</FONT>

	arties&#x201D;)

	and obligations of every kind and nature, in law, equity, or otherwise, both known and unknown, suspected and unsuspected, disclosed and undisclosed, arising out of or in any way related to agreements, events, acts or conduct at any time prior to and including the execution date of this Agreement, including but not limited to:&nbsp;&nbsp;all such claims and demands directly or indirectly arising out of or in any way connected with your employment with the Company or the termination of that employment; claims or demands related to salary, bonuses, commissions, stock, stock options, or any other ownership interests in the Company, vacation pay, fringe benefits, expense reimbursements, severance pay, or any other form of compensation; claims pursuant to any federal, state or local law, statute, or cause of action; tort law; or contract law

	(individually a &#x201C;Claim&#x201D; and collectively &#x201C;Claims&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;The Claims you are releasing and waiving in this Agreement include, but are not limited to, any and all Claims that any of the Company Parties:

	release, to the extent permitted by law, you waive any right or ability to be a class or collective action representative or to otherwise participate in any putative or certified class, collective or multi-party action or proceeding based on such a Claim in which any of the Company Parties is a party.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement does not abrogate your existing rights under any Company benefit plan or any plan or agreement related to equity ownership in the Company; however, it does waive, release and forever discharge Claims

	13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Your Acknowledgments and Affirmations/ Effective Date of Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	You acknowledge that you are knowingly and voluntarily waiving and releasing any and all rights you may have under the ADEA, as amended.&nbsp;&nbsp;You also acknowledge and agree that (i) the consideration given to you in exchange for the waiver and release in this Agreement is in addition to anything of value to which you were already entitled, and (ii) that you have been paid for all time worked, have received all the leave, leaves of absence and leave benefits and protections for which you are eligible, and have not suffered any on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the-job injury for which you have not already filed a Claim. You affirm that all of the decisions of the Company Parties regarding your pay and benefits through the date of your execution of this Agreement were not discriminatory based on age, disability, race, color, sex, religion, national origin or any other classification protected by law.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	You affirm that you have not filed or caused to be filed, and are not presently a party to, a Claim against any of the Company Parties.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	You further affirm that you have no known workplace injuries or occupational diseases.&nbsp;&nbsp;You acknowledge and affirm that you have not been retaliated against for reporting any allegation of corporate fraud or other wrongdoing by any of the Company Parties, or for exercising any rights protected by law, including any rights protected by the Fair Labor Standards Act, the Family Medical Leave Act or any related statute or local leave or disability accommodation laws,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or any applicable state workers&#x2019; compensation law.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	You further acknowledge and affirm that you have been advised by this writing that:&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) your waiver and release do not apply to any rights or Claims that may arise after the execution date of this Agreement; (b) you have been advised hereby that you have the right to consult with an attorney prior to executing this Agreement; (c) you have been given twenty-one (21) days to consider this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(although you may choose to voluntarily execute this Agreement earlier and if you do you will sign the Consideration Period waiver below)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	; (d) you have seven (7) days following your execution of this Agreement to revoke this Agreement; and (e) this Agreement shall not be effective until the date upon which the revocation period has expired unexercised (the "Effective Date"), which shall be the eighth day after this Agreement is executed by you.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	14.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Admission.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement does not constitute an admission by the Company of any wrongful action or violation of any federal, state, or local statute, or common law rights, including those relating to the provisions of any law or statute concerning employment actions, or of any other possible or claimed violation of law or rights.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;The Company agrees not to disparage you in any manner likely to be harmful to you or your business, business reputation or personal reputation; provided that the Company will respond accurately and fully to any question, inquiry or request for information when required by legal process.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s obligations under this Section are limited to Company representatives with knowledge of this provision.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	15.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Breach.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The parties agree that a material breach of this Agreement by one party excuses performance by the other party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, you acknowledge that it may be impossible to assess the damages caused by your violation of the terms of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Sections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8, 9,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	10 of this Agreement and further agree that any threatened or actual violation or breach of those
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s of this Agreement will constitute immediate and irreparable injury to the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;You therefore agree that any such breach of this Agreement is a material breach of this Agreement, and, in addition to any and all other damages and remedies available to the Company upon your breach of this Agreement, the Company shall be entitled to an injunction to prevent you from violating or breaching this Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If either party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is successful in whole or part in any legal or equitable action
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to enforce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	this Agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	then the enforcing party can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	recover
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	from the other party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	all of the costs, including reasonable attorneys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	fees, incurred in enforcing the terms of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	16.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 409A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;The Company is offering severance to you in reliance on Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-1(b)(9) and the short term deferral exemption in Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-1(b)(4).&nbsp;&nbsp;Any payments made in reliance on Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-1(b)(4) will be made not later than March 15, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of Code Section 409A, your right to receive any installment payments under this letter (whether severance payments, reimbursements or otherwise) shall be treated as a right to receive a series of separate payments and, accordingly, each installment payment hereunder shall at all times be considered a separate and distinct payment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	17.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Miscellaneous.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;This Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibits A and B, constitutes the complete, final and exclusive embodiment of the entire agreement between you and the Company with regard to this subject matter.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is entered into without reliance on any promise or representation, written or oral, other than those expressly contained herein, and it supersedes any other such promises, warranties or representations.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement may not be modified or amended except in a writing signed by both you and a duly authorized officer of the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement will bind the heirs, personal representatives, successors and assigns of both you and the Company, and inure to the benefit of both you and the Company, their heirs, successors and assigns.&nbsp;&nbsp;If any provision of this Agreement is determined to be invalid or unenforceable, in whole or in part, this determination will not affect any other provision of this Agreement and the provision in question will be modified by the court so as to be rendered enforceable.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement will be deemed to have been entered into and will be construed and enforced in accordance with the laws of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	State
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Delaware
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as applied to contracts made and to be performed entirely within
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Delaware
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If this Agreement is acceptable to you, please sign below and return the original to me on or before
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the date that is twenty-one (21) days after you have received this letter
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<A NAME="CERC-20151231EX1017532B4_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;">
	E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	xhibit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;">
	10.17
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
	CERECOR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
	Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
	Non- Employee Director Compensation Policy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
	Amended January 10, 2016
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Each member of the Board of Directors (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	) who is not also serving as an employee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cerecor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Inc.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or any of its subsidiaries (each such member, an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Eligible Director
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	) will receive the compensation described in this Non-Employee Director Compensation Policy for his or her Board service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	date this policy is adopted by the Compensation Committee of the Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n Eligible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Director may decline all or any portion of his or her compensation by giving notice to the Company prior to the date cash is to be paid or equity awards are to be granted, as the case may be.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This policy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is effective as of the Effective Date and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	may be amended at any time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in the sole discretion of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Board or the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Compensation Committee of the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Annual Cash Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The annual cash compensation amount set forth below is payable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in equal quarterly installments, payable in arrears on the last day of each calendar quarter in which service occurred
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. If an Eligible Director joins the Board or a committee of the Board at a time other than effective as of the first day of a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	calendar
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, each retainer set forth below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for such quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	will be pro-rated based on days served in the applicable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	calendar
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	regular
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	full
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	quarterly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	payments thereafter.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Likewise, if an Eligible Directo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ceases to serve on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Board or a committee of the Board at a time other than effective as of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	last
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	day of a calendar quarter, each retainer set forth below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for such quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	will be pro-rated based on days served in the applicable calendar quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All annual cash fees are vested upon payment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage156"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Annual Committee Chair Service Retainer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	(in addition to Committee Member Service Retainer)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chairman of the Audit Committee:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7,5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	00
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chairman of the Compensation Committee:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,000
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chairman of the Nominating
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and Corporate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Governance Committee:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3,5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	00
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Election to Receive Stock Options in Lieu of Cash
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	An Eligible Director may make an election to receive all or a portion of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	his or her
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	annual cash compensation described above in the form of stock options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of the Company&#x2019;s common stock (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Common Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Elections must be made in multiples of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5% of an Eligible Director&#x2019;s aggregate cash retainer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Timing of Elections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Current Eligible Directors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	: Elections must be made
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	prior to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	beginning of each quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	New Eligible Directors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	: Elections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	must be made within 30 days of becoming an Eligible Director, provided t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	hat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	such election shall be applicable only to the portion of the cash retainers earned after the date of the election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	New committee member or committee chair
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	: Elections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	must be made prior to the date that the Eligible Director becomes a committee member or committee chair (or, if a new Eligible Director, within 30 days of becoming a committee member or committee chair, provided t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	hat such election shall be applicable only to the portion of the cash retainer earned after the date of the election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72.3PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Description of Stock Options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The stock options will be granted under the Company&#x2019;s 2015 Omnibus Incentive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Plan (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	options will be granted on the date on which the cash would otherwise have been paid (i.e. on the last day of each calendar quarter)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All stock options granted will be non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	qualified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	using
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company&#x2019;s standard form of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Nonqualified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Stock Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Grant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	under the Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, with an exercise price per share equal to the last reported sale price of the Common Stock on the NASDAQ Capital Market on the date of grant or, if such grant date is not a trading date, on the last trading date prior to the grant date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a term of ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years from the date of grant (subject to earlier termination in connection with a termination of service as provided in the Plan)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The actual number of shares subject to the stock options will be determined so that the options have a &#x201C;fair value&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on the date of grant,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	using a Black-Scholes or binominal valuation model
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	consistent with the methodology used by the Company in preparing its financial statements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, equal to the amount of cash fees forgone.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	will immediately vest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and become exercisable in full
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	upon grant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
