<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage157"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Equity Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The equity compensation set forth below will be granted under the Plan. All stock options granted under this policy will be non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	qualified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	using
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company&#x2019;s standard form of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Nonqualified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Stock Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Grant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	under the Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, with an exercise price per share equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the last reported sale price of the Common Stock on the NASDAQ Capital Market on the date of grant or, if such grant date is not a trading date, on the last trading date prior to the grant date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a term of ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years from the date of grant (subject to earlier termination in connection with a termination of service as provided in the Plan).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Initial Grant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	for New Eligible Directors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or each Eligible Director who is first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	appointed or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	elected to the Board following the Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the date of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or appointment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(or, if such date is not a market trading day, the first market trading day thereafter),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Eligible Director will be automatically, and without further action by the Board or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Compensation Committee of the Board,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	granted a stock option for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	16,714
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of Common Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and become exercisable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	substantially equal annual installments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on the first, second and third anniversary of the date of grant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	subject to the Eligible Director&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	continu
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on each such vesting date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Annual Grant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	: On the date of each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	annual stockholder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	meeting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	held after the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, each Eligible Director
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	who continues to serve as a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	non-employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	member of the Board
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	following such stockholders meeting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	will be automatically, and without further action by the Board or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Compensation Committee of the Board,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	granted a stock option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8,357
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of Common Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and become exercisable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in full on the first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	anniversary of the grant date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	subject to the Eligible Director&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	continu
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ed service on such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vesting date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	PURSUANT TO

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>
